changes: Keep the Future Portfolio card from including one-off events that occur after the date you select.
Keep Forecast Progress Check from immediately flagging you as behind the saved projection when you review a snapshot on the same day you captured it.
Show exact asset values for the base and comparison portfolios in the Snapshot Comparison breakdown.
Collapse cards by default for first-time visitors and keep welcome page shortcuts opening their target sections without overriding saved preferences.
Clarify that Future Portfolio forecasts include one-off Scenario Modelling events.
Show the import data card before the export card so restoring information appears first in Settings.
Move the Snapshot Comparison card into the Snapshots page with the other snapshot tools.
Rename Progress Check to Forecast Progress Check and clarify that it compares against saved expected projections.
Rename the interest rate comparison fields to "Rate" and "Comparative rate" for clearer terminology.
Bond coupon content fix.
Simplify asset table deposit details by removing the end-of-period assumption text.
Keep current asset values and portfolio insights from adding recurring deposits on top of the amount you entered.
Remove the deposit day setting for assets and clarify that contributions are applied at the end of each period.
Adjust recurring deposit calculations so forecasts add each period's contribution at the end of that period.
Content updates for changelog card in settings page
Fix update confirmations so newly installed versions surface the right changelog entries by tracking the service worker's version.
Keep the Settings version display aligned with the installed release instead of the latest download to avoid mismatched notes.
Restore exported tax settings and the sticky navigation preference when importing profile backups.
Keep asset values at the amount entered by defaulting recurring deposits to month-end, allowing a custom deposit day, and updating the form labels.
Improve the in-app changelog loader so the Settings card flags when release notes fail to load.
Ensure the in-app update confirmation keeps showing release notes even when the prior version is difficult to detect.
Add a changelog card to the Settings page that lists the five most recent updates as a fallback.
Rename portfolio allocation labels from "Share" to "Portfolio %" for clarity.
Fix the update confirmation dialog so newly installed versions display their changelog entries.
Add an interest rate difference calculator to compare yearly earnings between two banks.
